knimeNode.name: PDB Connector XML Query Builder
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node to build an advanced query XML string for the RCSB PDB webservices to consume

intro.p: The PDB Connector XML Query Builder node provides a method to build an advanced PDB query without executing the query remotely.

The user interface dialog options are designed to be a close mimic of the interactive web-based search and reporting options provided at http://www.pdb.org/pdb/search/advSearch.do and the user is encouraged to explore this resource for a full explanation of each search option. The XML Query is made available as a flow variable ( xmlQuery ) after node execution.

The PDB Connector XML Query Builder node was developed by Vernalis (Cambridge, UK) , based on the original PDB Connector node developed by Enspiral Discovery in collaboration with Vernalis (Cambridge, UK) . For feedback and more information, please contact knime@vernalis.com
